page.title: 12BARNWELL PARK - WARDEN
page.content: The warden, Neil Lister, has many responsibilities, besides looking after the park.He has to cut the grass, plant trees,give information about the park, put signs up, give guided tours around the park,organize park events,deal with all the fishing and give talks about the health and safety of the park.He also has to discuss the land with the owners nearby. He chose the job because he likes working outside and with children.He works eight hours every day including weekends.He has worked there for two years and really likes it.
